mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectInfGodPrc Generator(Generator) 2018-06-26 */ BRND_ID , SESON_CD , DSGN_GRP_NO , CSMR_PRC , CSMR_PRC_TP_CD , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM INF_GOD_PRC WHERE 1 = 1
mapper.delete: DELETE /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.deleteInfGodPrc Generator(Generator) 2018-06-26 */ FROM INF_GOD_PRC WHERE 1 = 1
